protocol.name: P-AFFY-2
protocol.text: Labeling of samples was carried out according to the manufacturerâ€™s standard protocol

protocol.name: P-MEXP-24903
protocol.text: Plants were grown on soil for 35 days under short day conditions (8hrs light/16hrs dark)  at 16 C and  65% relative humidity. Flowering was induced by shifting to long day conditions (16/8) at 16 C and 65% relative humidity or to 25 C in short day conditions (8/16). Samples were taken at day 0, 2, 5 and 9 after shifting.

protocol.name: P-MEXP-24904
protocol.text: Plants grown at 16 C in short day conditions (8hrs light/16hrs dark) were shifted either to 16 C long days (16hrs light/8 hrs dark; Light shift) or to 25 C short days (8hrs light/16 hrs dark; Temperature shift).

protocol.name: P-MEXP-24905
protocol.text: Apices from 25 plants per genotype/treatment were pooled and RNA was extracted.

protocol.name: P-MEXP-24906
protocol.text: RNA was extracted from 25 pooled shoot apices from corresponding samples using the Qiagen RNA extraction kit
